settings.heading: Shipping & Delivery
settings.content: Orders placed with Free Shipping usually take 6-12 business days in transit. Please allow approximately 12-48 hours for order quality check, processing, and tracking information.

settings.heading: Our Promise
settings.content:
We proudly offer hassle-free returns within 30 days of delivery. 

If you feel that something is wrong with your order, contact support at hookahble@gmail.com and we'll provide you with an immediate solution.

settings.heading: Common FAQs
settings.content:
Is cupping therapy safe?

Yes! Our devices feature timed releases to avoid overuse along with a single-press instant release incase the pressure is bothersome.

Each cupper also comes with a build-in heating unit that reaches temperatures as high as 122°F (50°C) without any flames! However, please note that if you suffer from any health conditions or utilize medical devices, you may want to consult with your physician before undergoing any kind of therapy, cupping included.

Are they easy to use at home, by yourself?

Our devices are intuitive right out the box and very easy to apply to enjoy a healthy therapy session from home.


Featuring four buttons to control all the beneficial functions of our cuppers, Renoheal Smart Cupping Therapy is simply the most effective at-home remedy for relieving tension and promoting long-term health.

Should I use several devices at the same time?

To maximize your session's benefits, we suggest applying several of our devices for simultaneous function, saving time and enhancing the effectiveness of the session. This is why we have introduced deeper savings with larger quantity purchases!

Will it hurt or damage my skin?

With several levels of intensity, you are able to adjust the suction, massage, and heating power of our devices with ease to help you become comfortable with our devices at low levels before progressing.

Starting at a low level is most optimal for beginners and does not hurt or cause permanent skin damage. However, with extended use, you may notice the classic red circle bruises on your skin, this is temporary and indicates the effectiveness of our devices.

These marks will gradually disappear within a few days and they are nothing to worry about! Just be sure to properly sanitize before each session and avoid using on broken skin (cuts, open wounds, etc.).

settings.text: The Pet Hair Carpet Broom uses specially designed bristles that grab onto pet hair from carpets, rugs, and even furniture, removing it in a single sweep. No more battling with vacuums or lint rollers—this broom makes cleaning up after your pets quick and easy.

Unlike traditional cleaning tools that rely on disposable pads or electricity, this broom offers a sustainable solution. Made from high-quality, long-lasting materials, it reduces waste while providing reliable, efficient cleaning for years to come.
It's Easy! Just like a Traditional Hookah. Check out our video demonstrations on our website or on our social media to see for yourself!

The HookaHble™ features a carbon plate to withstand the hot coal. Paired with a clear cup for your liquid at the bottom which can be seen easily, so you can be sure you are safe whilst using The HookaHble™.
The HookaHble™ is super portable and you can take it anywhere. It's the same size as your water bottle! This means you can easily hold it or put it in your car's cupholder!
From the Carbon Plate to the soft touch silicone casing. Rest assured your HookaHble is built with the best materials.
The team at HookaHble will make sure you are satisfied with your purchase and our friendly customer service team will ensure any issues will be resolved ASAP. Check out our reviews!

I never thought I'd get a smooth, full shisha experience from something this portable. The design is sleek, super easy to set up, and perfect for road trips or chill sessions with friends. It's become my go-to over traditional hookahs—no mess, no hassle, just pure flavor anytime, anywhere. 10/10 recommend!

Zeyad E.

I was skeptical at first, but the HookaHble seriously delivers. It’s compact, stylish, and hits just like a full-sized shisha. I love how easy it is to carry around—perfect for beach days, parties, or just vibing at home. If you love shisha but hate the setup, this is the answer.

Shahmir S.

Super smooth, super portable—this thing is a must-have. Took it to a weekend trip with friends and it was the highlight. No bulky gear, no long prep—just pack it, puff it, and relax. It’s like having a lounge in your backpack.

Monty B.

We love our HookaHble™ and are confident you will too! That’s why we’re offering a 30-Day, Risk-Free Guarantee. If you’re not satisfied, we’ll gladly issue a full refund in accordance with our Return & Refund Policy.

settings.heading: Do you ship worldwide?
settings.row_content: We are proud to provide Worldwide Shipping to our customers! We ship to most countries worldwide.

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content: Orders placed with Free Shipping usually take 6-12 business days in transit. Please allow approximately 12-48 hours for order quality check, processing, and tracking information.

settings.heading: Is The HookaHble™ Safe?
settings.row_content:
Yes!

The HookaHble™ features a carbon plate to withstand the hot coal. Paired with a clear cup for your liquid at the bottom which can be seen easily, so you can be sure you are safe whilst using The HookaHble™.

settings.heading: How Do I Use The HookaHble?
settings.row_content: It's Easy! Just like a Traditional Hookah. Check out our video demonstrations on our website or on our social media to see for yourself!

settings.heading: Is It Safe To Share?
settings.row_content: The HookaHble™ is very easy to clean with a wipe. If you are allowing someone else to use your HookaHble™ it is always smart to clean it before hand. And to clean it regularly between usages. But there are no major worries when it comes to sharing your HookaHble™ with others.

settings.heading: How Portable Is It?
settings.row_content: The HookaHble™ is super portable and you can take it anywhere. It's the same size as your water bottle! This means you can easily hold it or put it in your car's cupholder!

settings.heading: Where Is The Hose?
settings.row_content: The hose is coiled up inside the main body of The HookaHble™.

settings.heading: What about warranty?
settings.row_content: All HookaHble™ products are backed with a 30 day money back guarantee and free shipping!
